title: Hand Which
sinopse:
Hand Which is a set of stories portraying friendship and love between men. Besides its stunning title story, it also includes extra one shots that are popular among fans.

1. Hand Which
2. Shake a Hand
3. Shoumi na Kokoro
4. Shoumi na Kotoba
5. Osewa ni Narimasu
6. Hankei 10 Meter no Inryoku
7. Chokusenjou ni Shite 8 Meter
